model.im_drive¶

This module includes a continuous-time model for an induction motor drive. The space vector models are implemented in stator coordinates.

Classes

Datalogger()

This class contains a datalogger.

DataloggerExtended()

Extends the default data logger for the model with the DC-bus dynamics.

Drive(motor, mech, converter, delay, pwm, …)

This class interconnects the subsystems of an induction motor drive and provides the interface to the solver.

DriveWithDiodeBridge(motor, mech, converter, …)

This subclass models an induction motor drive, equipped with a three-phase diode bridge.

Motor([R_s, R_R, L_sgm, L_M, p])

This class represents an induction motor.

MotorSaturated([R_s, R_R, L_sgm, L_M, p])

This subclass represents the Gamma model of a saturated induction motor.

SaturationModel([L_unsat, beta, S])

This data class contains a saturation model based on a simple power function.
